name: phonebook_backend
description: A backend seerver for the phonebook application from part 2

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../part2-phonebook && npm run build && cp -r build ../phonebook-backend
scripts.deploy: git push heroku main && git push origin main
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy

author: Ryan Shaikh
